title: JamesDaniel90
author: JamesDaniel90
content: I have only been invested in XRP for 3 months and its great they have now won the case but I expected more.For months I have been reading and watching videos online of predictions ranging from $2-10 when they win case and it didnt even reach $1. Why?I will hold for now and buy more if we go lower but did expect more , what is everyone else thinking?

comments.author: MAAManda
comments.body: Quote from: JamesDaniel90 on July 15, 2023, 05:04:26 PMFor months I have been reading and watching videos online of predictions ranging from $2-10 when they win case and it didnt even reach $1. Why?It's still 2 days after they won the case, mate. Don't be too quick to jump to conclusions, right now Ripple (XRP) is stealing a bit of the hype on the crypto side, if this hype continues and grows, it's not impossible that the predictions you mentioned will come true.Quote from: JamesDaniel90 on July 15, 2023, 05:04:26 PMI will hold for now and buy more if we go lower but did expect more , what is everyone else thinking?If I were you, I would keep holding on to my Ripple (XRP) until I heard one of the bad news around this asset. And when the price of $XRP falls even further, I'll not accumulate it again, be careful you don't get stuck in $XRP.

comments.author: montaga
comments.body: Quote from: JamesDaniel90 on July 15, 2023, 05:04:26 PMI have only been invested in XRP for 3 months and its great they have now won the case but I expected more.For months I have been reading and watching videos online of predictions ranging from $2-10 when they win case and it didnt even reach $1. Why?I will hold for now and buy more if we go lower but did expect more , what is everyone else thinking?Judge Analisa Torres, has ruled that the defendants in the SEC v. Ripple case committed violations of the Securities Act of 1933.Torres also ruled that Ripple’s co-founders, Brad Garlinghouse and Chris Larsen, should stand trial in front of a jury for their violations.How on earth is standing trial good news?

comments.author: ololajulo
comments.body: I don't know when SEC will end this witch hunt against cryptocurrency projects. The project should receive compensation from the damages they suffered as a result of the loss of the case. There was a reduction in advertisements, an exchange listing, and a massive loss in trades. There is no doubt they had a share in the wealth of Tron's CEO to allow the dubious loss

comments.author: dothebeats
comments.body: You've been sold the hype, that's why you're expecting more but it never came. While XRP may have won the case, there really isn't anything else that gives it value anyway. It's a great coin for transferring assets due to its fast network and low fees, but apart from that, what else? A lot of people only speculated on that $2 - $10 a coin without factoring in the market. Who will buy at those prices? Why will they buy at that price? There's really a lot of holes and gaps that the SEC ruling cannot fill, hence why people didn't buy much XRP and drive the price up.

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: Investors are cautious after the initial positive court case pump. Also maybe people with deep pockets used XRP as an opportunity to pump & dump. It’s just normal market behaviour, don’t look too deeply into it. We are nowhere near peak altcoin bull market so sit tight & be patient. Better times are coming but we need to be patient.

comments.author: Lamkuthang
comments.body: If you are able to hold that coin, I think any issue that will be born and occur is not something you need to think about. All you need to do is set the resale price to your liking and wait for your XRP to convert to USDT in your wallet. Regarding why this is the case, I think that our senior @DeathAngel's explanation is very clear and direct.

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: Quote from: JamesDaniel90 on July 15, 2023, 05:04:26 PMFor months I have been reading and watching videos online of predictions ranging from $2-10 when they win case and it didnt even reach $1. Why?Some of you traders joke too much. So you expected it to pump like some newly launched meme coin/shitcoin by 500% or 1000% within a day?Continue religiously believing those YouTubers, who don't even trade real money. You will completely be misled, and you will learn your lessons along.53% increase in the last 7 days isn't bad at all in the current market condition

comments.author: goaldigger
comments.body: Quote from: MAAManda on July 15, 2023, 07:57:17 PMQuote from: JamesDaniel90 on July 15, 2023, 05:04:26 PMFor months I have been reading and watching videos online of predictions ranging from $2-10 when they win case and it didnt even reach $1. Why?It's still 2 days after they won the case, mate. Don't be too quick to jump to conclusions, right now Ripple (XRP) is stealing a bit of the hype on the crypto side, if this hype continues and grows, it's not impossible that the predictions you mentioned will come true.The case is not totally settled yet, but this could be the first win for XRP so yes, we should not be in hurry.The market is getting better plus the positive news for XRP so there's no doubt about the future pump of XRP, and it can happen once the market enters the bull trend again. Beside, we already saw the pump for XRP after the positive news, we might see that once there's a final verdict for this case and I'm bullish for that, XRP will win again.

comments.author: wheelz1200
comments.body: Quote from: JamesDaniel90 on July 15, 2023, 05:04:26 PMI have only been invested in XRP for 3 months and its great they have now won the case but I expected more.For months I have been reading and watching videos online of predictions ranging from $2-10 when they win case and it didnt even reach $1. Why?I will hold for now and buy more if we go lower but did expect more , what is everyone else thinking?You have been sold a bag of goods from skillets that's why.  Anyone who claims that a particular altcoin is gonna do X amount without preaching that we must be in a bullun to do so should not be Irving advise.  Xrp was never going to go to $10 lol.  There would be wayyy too much sell pressure on the way up.

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: Quote from: JamesDaniel90 on July 15, 2023, 05:04:26 PMI have only been invested in XRP for 3 months and its great they have now won the case but I expected more.For months I have been reading and watching videos online of predictions ranging from $2-10 when they win case and it didnt even reach $1. Why?I will hold for now and buy more if we go lower but did expect more , what is everyone else thinking?Jesus, XRP bounces 71% in 1 day and that's not enough for you? It's a high cap, give it some time for pete's sake, those take time to move. I personally couln't care less about that centralized corporate coin and it has already superior alternatives. But you do you, obviously there's money to be made with that too.I admit i would have been happy if xrp would have just lost. To me it represents everything i hate about corporate cryptocurrencies.

comments.author: riskarcher
comments.body: Market situation still not good for now, especially The world is facing Inflation, i don't expect too much about XRP even they win against SEC but market can still be manipulated so don't care about FOMO at this time due to the hype is temporary only, just wait and see the right moment when fears come again and then it's the right time for entry market. The point is always DYOR and be careful every time you make a decision

comments.author: JamesDaniel90
comments.body: My average buy is 50 cents so I am happy and feel I will at least 3x my money i just assumed that once it did win it would happen straight away. I never believed those who said it would 10x but did think it would at least 2 or 3x. I can wait and if we do fall another 10% or so will buy more. It should at least reach $1 in the coming days/ weeks which would be a 2x for me.I will then just have to decide if I should sell or not

comments.author: Bolivar_Tony
comments.body: Quote from: JamesDaniel90 on July 15, 2023, 05:04:26 PMI have only been invested in XRP for 3 months and its great they have now won the case but I expected more.For months I have been reading and watching videos online of predictions ranging from $2-10 when they win case and it didnt even reach $1. Why?I will hold for now and buy more if we go lower but did expect more , what is everyone else thinking?Price prediction is a mere speculation, people predict base some some external factors but that doesn't mean their prediction will come to fruition, it could go side ways, at the end of the day, it's all about taking some risk and wait for the outcome,

comments.author: MAAManda
comments.body: Quote from: goaldigger on July 15, 2023, 09:08:33 PMThe case is not totally settled yet, but this could be the first win for XRP so yes, we should not be in hurry.The market is getting better plus the positive news for XRP so there's no doubt about the future pump of XRP, and it can happen once the market enters the bull trend again. Beside, we already saw the pump for XRP after the positive news, we might see that once there's a final verdict for this case and I'm bullish for that, XRP will win again. True, I believe there are still surprises that we will see in the near future, if it will be an absolute win on the side of Ripple (XRP) when the Halving will occur, this will add to the hype of Ripple to be much higher on the price side. There are lots of people out there predicting that the price of Ripple (XRP) will be at $5+, but for me the highest expectation is $2. WDYT?

comments.author: Reatim
comments.body: Quote from: JamesDaniel90 on July 15, 2023, 05:04:26 PMI have only been invested in XRP for 3 months and its great they have now won the case but I expected more.For months I have been reading and watching videos online of predictions ranging from $2-10 when they win case and it didnt even reach $1. Why?I will hold for now and buy more if we go lower but did expect more , what is everyone else thinking?if that is your attitude in crypto then you will gather nothing mate because it is just days after the case ended so why expect that much , and besides what I was looking here is the long term effect or else people truly leave their support in Ripple ,back in the days that I am a investor and holder of this coin but after what had happened couple years ago , I need to step out and find my luck in other currencies.Quote from: riskarcher on July 15, 2023, 11:27:46 PMMarket situation still not good for now, especially The world is facing Inflation, i don't expect too much about XRP even they win against SEC but market can still be manipulated so don't care about FOMO at this time due to the hype is temporary only, just wait and see the right moment when fears come again and then it's the right time for entry market. The point is always DYOR and be careful every time you make a decisionit is correct , though many believe that XRP will moon once the case ended favoring them yet there are some time to wait for and not just like a blink of an eye to happen.

comments.author: cheezcarls
comments.body: The hype didn't last a long while. As for the XRP's latest case in winning against SEC, that hype only lasted for a day which we see a tremendous temporary growth of it's coin and so as the others like Bitcoin, Ethereum, etc. But on the following day it didn't maintain the hype as we see a pullback. If you are smart enough of this scenario, you would have taken profit that easily rather than being greedy unless you are thinking long term of the coins like BTC and ETH.

comments.author: GreatArkansas
comments.body: Quote from: JamesDaniel90 on July 15, 2023, 05:04:26 PM(....)I will hold for now and buy more if we go lower but did expect more , what is everyone else thinking?"Buy the rumor, sell the news." is already happened here. Some people already took profit on the first pump and I am not saying it's already late because, in most of these kinds of pumps, there is always a follow-up pump as long as the market is still not yet dumped. I believe on the following days, there will still be sideways and pump again, just like what happened on Bitcoin Cash (BCH) before it was listed on new wall street's cryptocurrency exchange.

comments.author: Smitty Werben Man Jensen
comments.body: Quote from: cheezcarls on July 16, 2023, 07:14:20 AMThe hype didn't last a long while. As for the XRP's latest case in winning against SEC, that hype only lasted for a day which we see a tremendous temporary growth of it's coin and so as the others like Bitcoin, Ethereum, etc. But on the following day it didn't maintain the hype as we see a pullback. If you are smart enough of this scenario, you would have taken profit that easily rather than being greedy unless you are thinking long term of the coins like BTC and ETH.It's true that even though the hype only lasts one day, if we are smart in taking advantage of the opportunity, the results will also be profitable,i thought the hype could last longer but in reality it didn't,hopefully in the future there will be good news for XRP and see growth again.

comments.author: Ultegra134
comments.body: Quote from: cheezcarls on July 16, 2023, 07:14:20 AMThe hype didn't last a long while. As for the XRP's latest case in winning against SEC, that hype only lasted for a day which we see a tremendous temporary growth of it's coin and so as the others like Bitcoin, Ethereum, etc. But on the following day it didn't maintain the hype as we see a pullback. If you are smart enough of this scenario, you would have taken profit that easily rather than being greedy unless you are thinking long term of the coins like BTC and ETH.It's only been two or three days since the resolution of the SEC lawsuit, it's extremely early to make such assumptions. Also, it certainly did not last one day, XRP's price was less than $0.50 before the announcement that they won the lawsuit. It's now trending at $0.75, with a 60% increase in the last 7 days. On top of that, XRP surpassed BNB in market cap, and this is only the beginning; that's not insignificant at all. I'm not sure how it'll progress in the future, but so far, it has made decent advancements so far, which is positive, both for its future but also for other altcoins that were labeled as securities.
